mapper.select: SELECT fs.`fse_name`,fs.`fse_img`,fs.`fse_price`,fs.`fd_id`,fd.`fd_uid`,fs.`fse_id` ,fd.`fd_truename` FROM `flower_service` AS fs INNER JOIN `flower_designer` AS fd ON fs.`fd_id`=fd.`fd_id` WHERE fs.`fse_id`=#{fseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: fse_id, fse_name, fse_img, fse_ftime, fse_urgent, fse_price, fse_urgent_price, fse_priceunit, fse_count, fse_star, fd_id, fs_id
mapper.select: SELECT fse_text FROM flower_service WHERE fse_id=#{fseid}
SELECT se.* ,fd.* ,users.img AS fd_imges FROM flower_service AS se INNER JOIN flower_designer AS fd ON se.fd_id=fd.fd_id INNER JOIN users AS users ON fd.fd_uid=users.uid WHERE se.fse_id=#{fseid}
mapper.insert: insert into flower_service (fse_id, fse_name, fse_img, fse_ftime, fse_urgent, fse_price, fse_urgent_price, fse_priceunit, fse_count, fse_star, fd_id, fs_id, fse_text) values (#{fseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fseFtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fseUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fseUrgentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsePriceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fseStar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fseText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update flower_service
fse_name = #{fseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fse_img = #{fseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fse_ftime = #{fseFtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fse_urgent = #{fseUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fse_price = #{fsePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fse_urgent_price = #{fseUrgentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fse_priceunit = #{fsePriceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fse_count = #{fseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fse_star = #{fseStar,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fd_id = #{fdId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fs_id = #{fsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fse_text = #{fseText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where fse_id = #{fseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flower_service set fse_name = #{fseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fse_img = #{fseImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fse_ftime = #{fseFtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fse_urgent = #{fseUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fse_price = #{fsePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fse_urgent_price = #{fseUrgentPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fse_priceunit = #{fsePriceunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fse_count = #{fseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fse_star = #{fseStar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fd_id = #{fdId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fs_id = #{fsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fse_text = #{fseText,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where fse_id = #{fseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
